title: Seed taxonomy data in Sanity
description:
Phase C.1 - Seed Taxonomies:
- Create 7 gallery categories (room, common-spaces, facilities, etc.)
- Create 7 amenity categories (internet_climate, kitchen_dining, etc.)
- Create ~25 amenities with icons and category references

Use Sanity MCP tools for content operations.

title: Deploy Sanity schema and run typegen
description:
Phase A completion:
- Run `bunx sanity schema deploy` to deploy schema to Content Lake
- Run `bun run typegen` to regenerate TypeScript types
- Verify types are generated correctly

title: Migrate house content to Sanity
description:
Phase C.2 - House Content:
For each house (apple, lemon, orange):
- Upload gallery images to Sanity
- Configure amenities with notes (private/shared) and featured flags
- Enter pricing data (rows and notes)
- Enter location data (address, coordinates, stations, nearby)
- Enter about section (description, highlights)
- Enter phone numbers

Source: `messages/en.json` and existing component constants

title: Migrate FAQ and settings content to Sanity
description:

- Create contact types from `useContactNavigation` namespace
- Create site settings (company name, social links)

title: Cleanup: Remove redundant next-intl content
description:
